sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: All samples from mature S. album trees growing in a sandalwood plantation at the South China Botanical Garden (SCBG), which are available for non-commercial purposes, were collected. S. album seedlings were cultivated in the SCBG greenhouse. No specific permits were required.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
